mapper.select: SELECT NOTICENUMBER, ADMINID, NOTICETITLE, NOTICECONTENT, NOTICEVIEW, NOTICEDATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICENUMBER=#{noticeNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICENUMBER=#{noticeNumber}, ADMINID=#{adminId}, NOTICETITLE=#{noticeTitle}, NOTICECONTENT=#{noticeContent}, NOTICEVIEW=#{noticeView}, NOTICEDATE=#{noticeDate}
